data.description:
Join your Oculus friends to play board games in a whole new way! Filled with a growing list of easy to learn 2-4 player games and delightful interactions with something for everyone to discover. 

• Own any game and your Oculus friends can join and play for FREE!
• 100 FREE Coins available every 24 hours! Use it to try games or in-game concessions.
• Play games from our library with no set up, clean up, or explaining rules.

Host your next game night with your Oculus friends! Neverboard offers Crazy 8s free to play and you can also practice any game in the library with coins, so be sure to stock up on the FREE coins every day! Additional content and coins can be purchased in the game. Please note that public matchmaking is currently not available in Neverboard - you must have Oculus friends to play!

Still have questions? FAQs, how-tos, and more are available on our website or by joining the Neverboard Player's Club on Discord.

changelog.change_log:
Bet you know more trivia than your friends? Let's get quizzical! A new game just dropped in Neverboard that is perfect for the know-it-all trivia masters and casual guessers alike. In Risky Quizness the first to 3 points in each category wins! Even if you aren't a quizard in every subject, you have a chance to score by stealing points, forcing your opponents to answer tough questions in lightning rounds, and betting your opponents are wrong.
-NEW GAME: Risky Quizness
-NEW: A little card counting never hurt anyone. You can now see how many cards your friends are holding.
-FIX: Got big discard deck energy in Crazy 8s? No more flickering!
-FIX: The clock sound has been set to the right time in Odd One Out!
-FIX: There is even a little something for that rare case that everyone loses in Treasure! Try it if you don't believe us.

This isn’t just a pumpkin patch. Along with all NEW Halloween treats, prices on all concessions are slashed until we can give you a magic sack to stash your favorite picks. Try eating, shaking, grabbing, throwing, and pulling the trigger to discover all the tricks!
 
-ICYMI: Practice mode is now FREE if you own a game!
-FIX: In game invites are now faster! 
-FIX: No more getting stuck when playing Odd One Out!
-FIX: No more sticky keyboard in 4 Letter Word!

We heard you! The practice mode button was confusing! In this update we have moved the button to try out games alone with houseplants to each game start menu. Now if you own a game, you can practice it as much as you want FREE. Vincent Van Grow, Megan Thee Succulent, and Dr. Plant thank you for keeping them employed. Plus, you still don't have to roll the dice on any game purchase. Using coins you can try out any game you don't own yet.

* One time purchases for games
* Bug fixes
